Controller

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Andrew The class which is responsible for most game related dynamics This class serves as a 'Controller' within the Model-View-Controller Design Pattern

      static void CheckIfChickenWasKilled()

    • Method Detail

      • PlaySound

        public static void PlaySound(java.lang.String filePath)
        Parameters:
        filePath - of the audio file to be played. This method is called when chicken emerges, dies, during start screen, game over screen and win screen

      • CreateEnemyChicken

        public static void CreateEnemyChicken(int amountOfEnemyChickens)
        Parameters:
        amountOfEnemyChickens - that needs to be created. The game relies on this method to create enemy chickens

      • CheckIfChickenWasKilled

        public static void CheckIfChickenWasKilled()
        If an enemy chicken drift away from the screen, it needs to be eliminated from the screen. The score also needs to updated.

      • MonitorAndLimitTheAmountOfChickenInGame

        public static void MonitorAndLimitTheAmountOfChickenInGame()
        The game has to end if the score is lower than -100

      • DetermineWetherPlayerHasReachedMaxScore

        public static void DetermineWetherPlayerHasReachedMaxScore()
        The game needs to end if the player has reached a maximum score

      • speedUpEnemyAppearance

        public static void speedUpEnemyAppearance()
        To make the game more challenging, the speed of which the enemy chickens appear is raised every 1000 points.
